thread.title: Morgan Hilmi
thread.title_full: GLS Denmark anmeldt af Morgan Hilmi

author: Morgan Hilmi
title: Morgan Hilmi
text: I had the worst experience ever with GLS. Customer service is super rude and not helpful at all, and it's charged â‚¬0.80/min. Delivery dates are not reliable, nor the time : you're supposed to make yourself available from 9AM to 6PM... And the courier showed up at 7PM. Not to mention I was supposed to be delivered the day before... But the delivery never came so I lost the entire day. Run away from this company!
